description:
A categorization reflecting the format of the storage medium and housing of a carrier in combination with the type of intermediation device required to view, play, run, etc., the content of a resource.

Version: 1.0.0

1002.label: audio cartridge
1002.description: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing an audio tape.

1003.label: audio cylinder
1003.description: A carrier type that consists of a roller-shaped object on which sound waves are incised or indented in a continuous circular groove.

1004.label: audio disc
1004.description: A carrier type that consists of a disc on which sound waves, recorded as modulations, pulses, etc., are incised or indented in a continuous spiral groove.

1005.label: sound-track reel
1005.description: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of film on which sound is recorded.

1006.label: audio roll
1006.description: A carrier type that consists of a roll of paper on which musical notes are represented by perforations, designed to mechanically reproduce the music when used in a player piano, player organ, etc.

1007.label: audiocassette
1007.description: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing an audiotape.

1008.label: audiotape reel
1008.description: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of audiotape to be used with reel-to-reel audio equipment.

1011.label: computer card
1011.description: A carrier type that consists of a card containing digitally encoded data designed for use with a computer.

1012.label: computer chip cartridge
1012.description: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a miniaturized electronic circuit on a small wafer of semiconductor silicon, designed to provide additional processing, memory, or storage capacity.

1013.label: computer disc
1013.description: A carrier type that consists of a disc containing digitally encoded data that are magnetically or optically recorded.

1014.label: computer disc cartridge
1014.description: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing one or more computer discs.

1015.label: computer tape cartridge
1015.description: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a computer tape.

1016.label: computer tape cassette
1016.description: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a computer tape.

1017.label: computer tape reel
1017.description: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a length of computer tape to be used with a computer tape drive.

1018.label: online resource
1018.description: A carrier type that consists of a digital resource accessed by means of hardware and software connections to a communications network.

1021.label: aperture card
1021.description: A carrier type that consists of a card with one or more rectangular openings or apertures holding frames of microfilm.

1022.label: microfiche
1022.description: A carrier type that consists of a sheet of film bearing a number of micro-images in a two-dimensional array.

1023.label: microfiche cassette
1023.description: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing uncut microfiches.

1024.label: microfilm cartridge
1024.description: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a microfilm.

1025.label: microfilm cassette
1025.description: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a microfilm.

1026.label: microfilm reel
1026.description: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a microfilm, to be threaded into a microfilm reader.

1027.label: microfilm slip
1027.description: A carrier type that consists of a short strip of microfilm cut from a roll.

1028.label: microopaque
1028.description: A carrier type that consists of a card or sheet of opaque material bearing a number of micro-images in a two-dimensional array.

1030.label: microscope slide
1030.description: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of transparent material, with or without a protective mount, bearing a minute object designed for use with a device such as a microscope.

1032.label: film cartridge
1032.description: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a motion picture film.

1033.label: film cassette
1033.description: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a motion picture film.

1034.label: film reel
1034.description: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a motion picture film to be used with a motion picture film projector.

1035.label: filmslip
1035.description: A carrier type that consists of a short strip of film, usually in rigid format rather than rolled.

1036.label: filmstrip
1036.description: A carrier type that consists of a roll of film, with or without recorded sound, containing a succession of images intended for projection one at a time.

1037.label: filmstrip cartridge
1037.description: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a filmstrip.

1039.label: overhead transparency
1039.description: A carrier type that consists of a sheet of transparent material, with or without a protective mount, bearing an image designed for use with an overhead projector.

1040.label: slide
1040.description: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of transparent material, usually in a protective mount, bearing an image designed for use with a slide projector or viewer.

1042.label: stereograph card
1042.description: A carrier type that consists of a card bearing stereographic images.

1043.label: stereograph disc
1043.description: A carrier type that consists of a disc with openings around the perimeter holding pairs of still images designed for use with a stereograph viewer.

1045.label: card
1045.description: A carrier type that consists of a small sheet of opaque material.

1046.label: flipchart
1046.description: A carrier type that consists of a hinging device holding two or more sheets designed for use on an easel.

1047.label: roll
1047.description: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of paper, film, tape, etc.

1048.label: sheet
1048.description: A carrier type that consists of a flat, thin piece of paper, plastic, etc.

1049.label: volume
1049.description: A carrier type that consists of one or more sheets bound or fastened together to form a single unit.

1051.label: video cartridge
1051.description: A carrier type that consists of a cartridge containing a video tape.

1052.label: videocassette
1052.description: A carrier type that consists of a cassette containing a video tape.

1053.label: videotape reel
1053.description: A carrier type that consists of an open reel holding a video tape for use with reel-to-reel video equipment.

1056.label: microfilm roll
1056.description: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of microfilm.

1059.label: object
1059.description: A carrier type that consists of a three-dimensional artifact, a replica of an artifact, or a naturally-occurring object.

1060.label: videodisc
1060.description: A carrier type that consists of a disc on which video signals, with or without sound, are recorded.

1069.label: film roll
1069.description: A carrier type that consists of a wound length of film.

1070.label: audio belt
1070.description: A carrier type that consists of a loop of flexible plastic or magnetic film on which audio signals are mechanically recorded, commonly known under the trade name Dictabelt.

1071.label: audio wire reel
1071.description: A carrier type that consists of a reel or spool of steel or stainless steel wire upon which audio signals are magnetically recorded.
